game_description: Dark Den: is Single Player, ARPG (Action Role Play Game), full of adventure, only possible in VR Welcome to Dark Den: Mystery Awaits. The Den is full of tasks, wicked and powerful enemies, it will take courage, strength, and survival instincts to defeat them. DARK DEN: delivers an unparallel experience with its unique environment. Experience the THRILL - Fall, Climb, Run, Jump, Trek, Dodge the snakes, take the ladders, fight the enemy, and save some lives. Collect the MYSTERY BOXES on the Board. UNLEASH THE BEAST. Use the weapons to FIGHT and win levels.
review_1: And I thought I'd like this game after the intro then came the impossible wall well jumping climb wow after 1 hr can't get to the top cuzz rock steps are too far apart , jumps are weak with no momentum carrying u as u walk only with no sprint or real leaping ability WTH impossible about to quit for good senseless development of a game mechanics from the start it's impossible to jump certain stone steps then u fall way down only to fail again on stones waaaaaay too far apart lame needs to be fixed ASAP
review_2: I love the game very fun to play and scary very cool game sure any time
